title: Me Tarzan You Dead
description: Assembled on the roof of the Federal Laboratory for Industrial Technology, a high-ranking group of bureaucrats, Members of Congress, and technical gurus, await the demonstration of a new robotics technology to be used in space. The robot arms perform with admirable precision until they take an unexpected turn, diminishing the high-ranking group by one.Washington Academy of Sciences Seal of Approval for scientific accuracy
author: Peg Kay
